text: “Tegeeza Alooni ne batabani be n’abaana ba Isirayiri bonna, obagambe nti, Omuntu yenna ow’omu nnyumba ya Isirayiri omu ku mmwe, oba omunnaggwanga abeera mu Isirayiri, bw’anaaleeteranga Mukama Katonda ekirabo eky’ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa okutuukiriza obweyamo bwe, oba ekiweebwayo olw’okweyagalira,
